text: Tricia Gardiner (born 16 August 1935) is a British equestrian. She competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:British female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from London
title: Tricia Gardiner
